title: What are the most mind-blowing videos ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any video by cyriak Talk about a crazy twisted mind coupled with mad animation skills.  He also makes his own music for his videos. This was the first video of his that I ever saw - I can't even begin to guess the meaning behind it:   This one is a little tamer, more fun than bizarro, but still pretty amazing:  I also really like this one of his:
This is a pretty extraordinary video, featuring time lapse photography from a mountain where the sky is oh so clear:  http://vimeo.com/22439234 And I love this one two - Super Slo Mo Wave Surfing:
